title: 3 and Out - Brady's Back Reaction, Amari --> Browns, Kirk Cou$ins
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Brady's Back Reaction, Amari --> Browns, Kirk Cou$ins
description:
John reacts to the news that Tom Brady is returning to make another run with the Bucs, the Browns dealing for pricey Amari Cooper, and Kirk Cousins signing another huge extension.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
